description:
'''Amesoeurs''' was a French [[post-punk]]/[[post-black metal]] band. A side project of [[Neige (musician)|Neige]] of [[Alcest]], the group was formed with musicians [[Audrey Sylvain]] and [[Fursy Teyssier]] in the summer of 2004. Their goal was to create music that "reflects the dark side of the industrial era and modern civilization".

Teyssier initially left the band shortly after its creation, but returned in 2008, while Winterhalter, who would go on to join both Alcest and [[Les Discrets]], joined in 2007. The band disbanded in 2009.
